nodes.text: A jerikan was a square-type container used to keep water clean and fresh on Tatooine.

A jerikan appears in Anakin's Fate, a children's book written by Marc Cerasini. In real life, jerrycans were containers for fuel and water designed by Germany prior to World War II. The design was subsequently reverse-engineered and utilized by Germany's enemies, the Allies, and they are still in use by these countries today. Nonetheless, no more than phonetical and functional connections are made in Cerasini's work.
